Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory102.png'}
{3: 'From then on, Liv joins the others in "Operation Christmas".'}
{3: 'What started off as an effort to cheer up Liv, is now a team effort to create their very first Christmas together.'}
{3: 'Their temporary base is an ordinary abandoned building located in the northern region of what was once Russia.'}
{3: 'After the Punishing Virus swept the Earth, the land had been long since abandoned. Collapsed ruins, overgrowth, and dilapidated facilities spread throughout the barren wasteland.'}
{3: 'But after considerable effort, this abandoned structure had been transformed into a warm abode.'}
{3: "It's now filled with the group's merry cheers."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "(Sighs) We're finally done...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'How do you feel, Commandant?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Not half bad.', 3: '15', 4: 'Christmas is here!', 5: '15'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Considering how this place looked before, it's not the perfect holiday cabin.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Phew, I'm beat... If I don't get something out of this, I'm never workin' my butt off for you ever again!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "You've worked hard too, Nanami.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'You must be so tired after taking the stool out from under me while I hung the wreath...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Hahaha, yeah... You must be exhausted from tracking in all the snow while I was busy cleaning.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hehehe! Yeah, it was a blast! You see them, Liv? My footprints look like lil' ducks!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Hey! I just finished sweeping the floorâ€”!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I think we should find a nanny to keep an eye on her.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I'm not a child! Treat me like one, and I'll cut you to pieces with my chainsaw!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Now that we've finished decorating the place, it really feels like Christmas in here. But feels like something is missing...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Oh, I know! I\'m missing a little "something."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "We can't just quietly go to bed on Christmas Eve. Just enjoying the starry night sky isn't enough.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'We should have a firework show for it to be a festival of excitement and joy. Right?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Fireworks? I love fireworks!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "But that's easier said than done... Fireworks aren't easy to come by in a place like this. Any ideas?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'We know you like fireworks.', 3: '50', 4: 'So we already thought of something.', 5: '50'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Not just fireworks, but also the Christmas Even bell. We've thought of everything.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Christmas Eve bell?! B-but how are you going to do that?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I took a detour and went exploring while we were on the mission. There's an old clock tower in a town nearby.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It's the tallest building in the town. If someone goes up and rings it, I bet everyone within a ten-kilometer radius could hear it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It's also the best place to light fireworks. Without any trees to block our view, we've got the best seats in the house to watch the fireworks.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Isn't the road dangerous, though? I'm already at my limits...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "...Yes, that's why I'm worried. We haven't received any news on the transmitter yet. And when we try to use it, the signal's too unstable.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Is everything alright? Karenina...', 4: '1'}
